products.name: La Lagartija
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavor.

products.name: El Tigre
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with carmel.

products.name: La Cucaracha
products.description: Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavors. Carmel, grapes, strawberry, you name it! It's a great choice for warm summer days.
